ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Chains\Binding no longer overwrites snare
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh..just reply, No, you belong to me, now. If he protests, just fire up Jaxon s Jig of Vigor, and try to convince him that it was a mistake, it really does
ygData.messageBody:
Heh..just reply, No, you belong to me, now.

If he protests, just fire up Jaxon's Jig of Vigor, and try to convince him
that it was a mistake, it really does help mana regen afterall...
"Dude! Look at your mana bar go! Woot!"

Kinda like the group xp bonus. First there was a bonus, then there wasn't,
now they've admitted there is, and it's getting bigger! (yay!)...heh.

At

-----Original Message-----
From: Gordon Hughes [mailto:ghughes@...]
Sent: Monday, January 15, 2001 11:52 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Chains\Binding no longer overwrites snare


>
What I have not tested:

* Other versions of our chains (the lvl 23 and lvl 54 aoe song) and
slow songs (lvl 21 aoe) against snare or slow
>

Consonant Chains (23) does now 'stack' with snare. I was using it in
Dreadlands and Sol B over the weekend. Perviously if I sang Chains on a
snared mob, once the Chains fell, so did snare. Not any more.

I haven't tried Melodic Binding (20, not 21) yet, but will try tonight.

Kyri.

And might I just add I'm getting sick of the whole "All your base are belong
to us!" thing? One particularly immature mage in my group insisted on
saying "All your Bard are belong to us... hehe" *every* *single* time I
fired up Chorus of Clarity.

/ponder


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
